beer.beer_description:
Lehčí pivo, příjemně hořké, vyvážené chuti a zlaté barvy.

A lighter beer of nicely bitter, well-balanced taste and golden colour.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 345 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 70!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 255 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 52!

Known for their pale lagers and pilsners, the Czech Republic has a long standing tradition of brewing. With the highest beer consumption per capita in the world, you’ll fit right in. That's 30 different beers from a brewery from the Czech Republic. Try 5 more for Level 7!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 130 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 27!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 40 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 9!

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 3 years on Untappd!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 25 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 6!

user.bio: Всё пиво не попробовать, но стремиться к этому надо!
